questions.question: Which of these was the very first video game?

imageMetadata.resources: Contrary to popular belief, Pong was not the very first video game. It was actually Tennis for Two, created in 1958.

questions.resources: Contrary to popular belief, Pong was not the very first video game. It was actually Tennis for Two, created in 1958.

questions.question: What was the very first home video games console?

imageMetadata.resources: The Magnavox Odyssey was the first commercially available home video game console, released in 1972.

questions.resources: The Magnavox Odyssey was the first commercially available home video game console, released in 1972.

questions.question: This 1984 game that conquered America was created by a mathematician in the Soviet Union

imageMetadata.resources: The name comes from combining "tetra," the Greek word for four, with "tennis."

Is there anything pizza can't do?
With 94% of those surveyed being able to identify him, Pac-Man is the most recognised video game character, narrowly beating Mario at 93%.

questions.question: What is the best-selling individual game of all time?

imageMetadata.resources:
Tetris is the best-selling game of all time, with almost half a billion sales since its launch in 1984.
